chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Blessed is every one that feareth the LORD; that walketh in his ways.
items.plainText: Blessed is every one that feareth the LORD; that walketh in his ways.

items.text: For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.
items.plainText: For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.

items.text: Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.
items.plainText: Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.

items.text: Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the LORD.
items.plainText: Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the LORD.

items.text: The LORD shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.
items.plainText: The LORD shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.

items.text: Yea, thou shalt see thy children's children, and peace upon Israel.
items.plainText: Yea, thou shalt see thy children's children, and peace upon Israel.
